com.rexsl.maven.utils

Class RuntimeResponseWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • com.rexsl.maven.utils.RuntimeResponseWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpServletResponse, ServletResponse

    public final class RuntimeResponseWrapper
extends HttpServletResponseWrapper
    Runtime wrapper that redirects all the writes to ByteArrayOutputStream.
    Version:
    $Id: RuntimeResponseWrapper.java 2226 2012-11-13 08:27:20Z guard $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com), Krzysztof Krason (Krzysztof.Krason@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    RuntimeFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest,ServletResponse,FilterChain)
